greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permanent of the character table of the symmetric group S_n.
comment: In the Schmidt-Simion reference it is proved that if A000701(n) is odd then a(n) = 0. So a(11)=a(12)=a(13)=0. The computation of a(10) involves a permanent of dimension 42, and it may take a long time for GAP to compute it.
link: F. W. Schmidt and R. Simion, On a partition identity, J. Combin. Theory, A 36 (1984), 249-252.
results.author: Yuval Dekel (dekelyuval(AT)hotmail.com), Jul 26 2003
